sentences.english: Second, it is utilized, at times, as a decoy for incorporating the opposition.
sentences.chinese: 其次，政府有时以补助做为收编反对势力的诱饵。

sentences.english: Also, Blanc will use Gianluigi Buffon as bait.
sentences.chinese: 同时，布兰科将会用布冯作为诱饵。

sentences.english: “We can use mirror cells as a honeypot, ” he says.
sentences.chinese: “我们可以利用镜像细胞作为诱饵，”他说。

sentences.english: The system focuses on the counterwork stage between decoy and torpedo.
sentences.chinese: 该系统将目标定位于声诱饵诱骗鱼雷的对抗阶段。

sentences.english: Looking for an inconspicuous decoy to get you past the patrol?
sentences.chinese: 想找一种不起眼的诱饵帮你摆脱那些警卫么？

sentences.english: Baiting of the animals is not allowed.
sentences.chinese: 动物诱饵是不允许使用的。

sentences.english: Build a better mousetrap and the world will beat a path to your door.
sentences.chinese: 放置一个更具吸引力的诱饵，世界的机遇将纷至沓来。

sentences.english: He is baiting the fish hook with bait made from earthworms.
sentences.chinese: 他在鱼钩上挂上用蚯蚓制成的鱼食做诱饵。

sentences.english: Professor Schlein led the sweet bait research.
sentences.chinese: Schlein教授领导了这项甜味诱饵研究。

sentences.english: Huang association army with silver and food do bait aggressively recruiting.
sentences.chinese: 皇协军以银元和食物做诱饵大肆招兵。

sentences.english: As a result, the Ontario Lottery continued to sell scratch tickets with baited hooks.
sentences.chinese: 最后，安大略博彩继续出售具有诱饵的刮彩。

sentences.english: We didn't buy mesh net for protecting bait, that was so wrong.
sentences.chinese: 我们没买专门放诱饵的网子，这是错误的。

sentences.english: In this case, the document instance lists only one lure.
sentences.chinese: 在本例中，此文档实例只列出一个诱饵。

sentences.english: He decoyed the ducks to an area right in front of the blind.
sentences.chinese: 他把野鸭群诱至诱饵正前方的地区。

sentences.english: The long antenna-like stalks growing from the opee sea killer's head are actually lures that the beast uses to attract prey.
sentences.chinese: 奥皮海洋杀手运用头顶的长触须作为诱捕猎物的诱饵。

sentences.english: The surviving privileged members of S. T. A. R. S. were just the perfect bait.
sentences.chinese: 活下来的幸运儿们正好是完美的诱饵。

definition: to coerce (sb into doing sth bad)/to lure (into a trap)/to seduce
to lure into/to entrap/to trick into/to entice/to induce/to invite/to tempt
to entice/to lure/to scam/to hoodwink/to decoy
use a long line to catch a big fish (idiom); a long-term plan for major returns
pinyin: fang4 chang2 xian4 diao4 da4 yu2

definition: to use gain as a lure
to beat sb at their own game (idiom)
lit. to pull a snake from its hole/to expose a malefactor (idiom)
taken in (by sb's deceit)/to be fooled/to be duped
